product_name: Kiehl's Since 1851Travel Size Ultra Facial Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackThe Kiehl's Since 1851 Travel Size Ultra Facial Cleanser is foaming and formulated to help remove excess oil, dirt, and debris.
details: DetailsBenefitsGently cleanses without over-drying or stripping skin of its natural oilsHelps dissolve excess oil, dirt and debrisTested for safety and gentlenesspH-balancedFor all skin types, including sensitive skinA customer favoriteKey IngredientsSqualane: a highly-refined botanical lipid derived from olives; with an exceptional affinity to skin, it absorbs easily and is known to help replenish skin's barrier keeping it soft, supple, and moisturizedApricot Kernels: act as a gentle exfoliantAvocado Oil: has a rich, emollient texture and contains a balance of lipids including omega essential fatty acids; known to moisturize, nourish and soften skinItem 2544321How To UseApply a small amount to clean fingertipsGently massage into damp facial areas in upward, circular motions, avoiding the immediate eye areaRinse thoroughly or remove excess with a damp wash clothIngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Acrylates Copolymer, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Lauryl Glucoside, Peg-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycol Distearate, Pentylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Chloride, Hydroxyacetophenone, Benzoic Acid, Squalane, Glycine Soja Oil/Soybean Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil/Sweet Almond Oil, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil/Apricot Kernel Oil, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Persea Gratissima Oil/Avocado Oil.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a small amount to clean fingertipsGently massage into damp facial areas in upward, circular motions, avoiding the immediate eye areaRinse thoroughly or remove excess with a damp wash cloth
ingredients: Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil/Sweet Almond Oil
Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil/Apricot Kernel Oil

reviews.headline: Using it for a long time!
reviews.comments: Great gentle face wash even takes off eye makeup gently.

reviews.headline: Kiehl's Ultra Face Cleanser
reviews.comments: Love this cleanser! Just a small amount is needed and leaves your skin moisturized and clean.  I like the travel size as I can easily pack the tube in my bag. Very nice product!

reviews.headline: YIKES
reviews.comments: I used this twice and currently trying to nurse my face back to health. My left cheek is covered in hives and my forehead isn't far behind. I thought it smelt chemically but wanted to give it a try.  I should've trusted my nose.

reviews.headline: HG
reviews.comments: On my second bottle cus its so goood and gentle

reviews.headline: I love this cleanser
reviews.comments: This is a great cleanser you only need a pea size amount. I dont wear makeup so I cant attest to how well it does for that. But my skin has never been more clear. I finally know what she likes

reviews.headline: Kiehl's
reviews.comments: It's very good on my skin.

reviews.headline: Only a 4 because i've been trying it out for a week
reviews.comments: I'd been eyeing this brand for a very long time but I never purchased anything from them...i'm so upset about not doing so earlierâ€”THIS STUFF IS GREAT!! I've bought the ultra facial cream , Midnight Recovery, and this item above!! They all work so well with my combination skin and it's making it feel plumped and moisturized in a very non-greasy way!! I'm so glad i FINALLY decided to purchase their stuff i'm in love!! Definitely give it a try ! It's for all skin types and well i'm combo sensitive and i've got nothing to say against it.

reviews.headline: SO GOOD
reviews.comments: I have tried so many cleansers and this is by far my favorite!!
